name: VSL: Virtual Steganographic Laboratory

screenshots.caption: Example flow of parallel message embedding with two methods
Example flow of experiment representing attack on LSB method
Examining LSB resistance on Salt&Pepper noise

short_description: VSL is free image steganography and steganalysis software in form of graphical block diagramming tool. It allows complex using, testing and adjusting different steganographic techniques and provides simple GUI along with modular, plug-in architecture
